BUL3130 - Legal and Ethical Environment.name: BUL3130 - Legal and Ethical Environment of Business

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Completion of each course in the Business common program prerequisites with a "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Analysis of the law as a dynamic social and political institution in the business environment, including contract law, torts, and ethical consideration.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Kenneth G Dixon School of Accounting

BUL3130H - Honors Legal & Ethical Enviro.name: BUL3130H - Honors Legal & Ethical Environment of Business:

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Junior standing and business major or minor, permission of Honors.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Analysis of the law as a dynamic social and political institution in the business environment, including ethical considerations with honors level content.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Kenneth G Dixon School of Accounting

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Management major or minor, MAN 3025 and MAN 3301.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An examination of current employment law and issues/trends in the legal environment impacting human resource management system design, HRM policy and employee relations.
